CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: All polymers showed relatively deep HOMO levels that consequently lead to high open circuit voltage of the solar cell devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. Identify the entities related to materials in the paragraph.
2. Determine which of these entities are "Material Name" entities.

Step 1:
Entities related to materials:
- All polymers

Step 2:
"All polymers" is a collective noun that refers to a group or class of materials. Therefore, it is not a specific Material Name entity, but rather a category or group of Material Name entities.

To identify specific Material Name entities, we would need to know the names of the individual polymers being referred to in the paragraph. Without that information, it is not possible to identify specific Material Name entities in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Without specific information about the individual polymers mentioned in the paragraph, it is not possible to identify any specific Material Name entities. The paragraph only refers to "All polymers" as a group or category of materials. Therefore, there are no relevant Material Name entities in the paragraph as it stands.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| All polymers |

Note: This table only includes the "All polymers" entity mentioned in the paragraph, but since it is a collective noun referring to a group or class of materials, it does not provide specific Material Name entities. To identify specific Material Name entities, we would need to know the names of the individual polymers being referred to in the paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: All polymers showed relatively deep HOMO levels that consequently lead to high open circuit voltage of the solar cell devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. HOMO: Hole Occupied Moiety or Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital is a property related to the energy level of a molecule or a material, specifically the energy level of the last electron that is easily given up. In this context, HOMO is the property name.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.
1. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital or energy level of the last electron easily given up by a material)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital or energy level of the last electron easily given up by a material) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: All polymers showed relatively deep HOMO levels that consequently lead to high open circuit voltage of the solar cell devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. "relatively deep HOMO levels": HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) is a property related to the electronic structure of polymers. The depth of the HOMO level is a quantitative value that describes the energy level at which the highest number of electrons are present in the material.
2. "high open circuit voltage": Open circuit voltage (Voc) is a property of a solar cell, which is the voltage at which the solar cell generates electricity under open circuit conditions (no load). A high open circuit voltage indicates that the solar cell can generate a significant voltage difference between the positive and negative electrodes.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. relatively deep HOMO levels (energy level value related to electronic structure of polymers)
2. high open circuit voltage (voltage value related to the performance of solar cell devices)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| relatively deep HOMO levels (energy level values of electronic structure of polymers) |
| high open circuit voltage (voltage value of solar cell devices) |
